Articles.Content:
Hi! here is some simple crafts.

What they does is dropping a rover(or a jeep,depending on the model),the max speed is mach 2(660 meter/second).

The three screenshot is for the plane that drop a rover,the other plane is exactly the same,but drop a jeep instead.

I did the range test once,but at that moment,i managed to do someting around 713 kilometer.

Edited February 20, 2015 by goldenpeach
